headline: Why Ford Investors Might Have to Say Goodbye to Its Special Dividend
summary: Investors can bank on Ford's traditional dividend for income, but its highly valuable supplemental dividend could be at risk in the near term.

headline: Red Bull's Max Verstappen: 'We remain calm, we're very focused' ahead of big 2026 F1 season
summary: The 2026 Formula season begins with new regulations for the vehicles to make racing more exciting. Red Bull driver Max Verstappen will put the team's new car through its paces at upcoming test sessions, starting in Barcelona this winter.

headline: 1 Reason Investors Can Take Ford Stock to the Bank
summary: There are numerous reasons to be bullish on Ford long-term, but don't overlook one primary reason to own shares.

headline: Trump's protectionist trade policies allow China to swoop in
summary: America’s top trading partners are responding to President Donald Trump’s belligerent and unpredictable trade policies by trying to take their business elsewhere.  Canada broke with the United States Friday, slashing its 100% import tax on Chinese electric vehicles in return for lower tariffs on Canadian farm products, particularly canola seeds.  “It’s a huge declaration of realignment in Canada’s economic relations,” said Edward Alden, who studies trade issues as senior fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations.
